bibl.title: A Graeco-Roman Group Statue of Unusual Character from Dendera.
bibl.note: Cairo JE 46278. Sandstone statue, 110 cm. Dendera temple area, IInd century A.D. or later. It depicts two naked children, one male and one female (Harpocrates and his female counterpart?) standing within the coils of two serpents (Isis Thermouthis and Serapis-Agathos Daimon).
bibl.seg: ABDALLA Aly, A Graeco-Roman Group Statue of Unusual Character from Dendera.

Cairo JE 46278. Sandstone statue, 110 cm. Dendera temple area, IInd century A.D. or later. It depicts two naked children, one male and one female (Harpocrates and his female counterpart?) standing within the coils of two serpents (Isis Thermouthis and Serapis-Agathos Daimon).
